pre_caption: This is a point-of-view shot from the dashboard of a car traveling on a multi-lane highway at night. The video is a time-lapse or uses a long exposure, creating a dynamic sense of rapid forward motion. This effect blurs the overhead streetlights and distant city lights into long, glowing streaks against the dark night sky.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
